description: This Dart source file defines enumerations, a generic Range class, and a FilterCriteria class used for filtering user preferences based on attributes like hair color, race, religion, height, and weight. The classes include detailed documentation and are designed for use within a filtering or matchmaking feature of an application.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: A generic immutable class representing a numerical range with minimum and maximum bounds, used for height and weight ranges.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: An immutable data class that encapsulates user-selected filtering options, including categorical sets and ranges for height and weight.

methods.name: filterCriteria.copyWith
methods.description: Returns a new FilterCriteria instance with specified overrides applied.
